text: William Laird "Bill" Cowher (born May 8, 1957) is a former American football coach and player. He coached the Pittsburgh Steelers for 15 seasons. He is an analyst for The NFL Today. He won his only Super Bowl when the Pittsburgh Steelers beat the Seattle Seahawks. ==References== Category:National Football League coaches Category:American football linebackers Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Bill Cowher
